          <title>
            <string language="sl">Nihajoč naboj</string>
            <string language="en">Oscillating charge</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Oszillierende Ladung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Charge d'oscillation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Carga oscilando</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Carica oscillante</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ταλαντεμένος δαπάνη</string>

          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Nihanje električno nabitega delca z vzmetjo pritjenega na drug delec.</string>
            <string language="en">Harmonic motion of two charged particles  interconnected with spring.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">električni naboj</string>
            <string language="en">electric charge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">nihanje</string>
            <string language="en">oscillation</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="sl">colos</string>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">templates</string>
            <string language="en">templates</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Harmonische Bewegung von zwei lud die Partikel 
auf, die mit Frühling zusammengeschaltet wurden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le mouvement harmonique de deux a chargé des 
particules interconnectées du ressort.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O movimento harmonic de dois carregou as 
partículas interconectadas com a mola.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un movimento armonico di due ha caricato le 
particelle collegate della molla.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η αρμονική κίνηση δύο χρέωσε τα μόρια που 
διασυνδέθηκαν με την άνοιξη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El movimiento armónico de dos cargó las 
partículas interconectadas con el resorte.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrische Ladung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Pendelbewegung</string>
